price: Tunakusomea khabari za Musa na Firauni kwa Haki kwa ajili ya watu wanao amini.
arabic: نَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡكَ مِن نَّبَإِ مُوسَىٰ وَفِرۡعَوۡنَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ لِقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: Tunakusimulia baadhi ya khabari za Musa na Firauni kwa ukweli, ili wapate kuzizingatia Waumini.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: natlū ʿalayka min naba-i mūsā wafir'ʿawna bil-ḥaqi liqawmin yu'minūna
